name: Side story & Player character "Sakuya Izayoi" / 外传剧情 & 玩家角色「十六夜咲夜」 / 外伝ストーリー & プレイヤーキャラ「十六夜咲夜」  (Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-)
detailed_description:
Adds the following content to Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-.

Side story
･Clock Remains

Player character
･Sakuya Izayoi

Partner character
･Reimu Hakurei

Equipments
･High-Class Tea Set
･Dummy Effect

Spell Cards
･Silver Sign, "Silver Bound"
･Scar Soul, "Soul Sculpture"

[Attention]
Playable characters could be used from the start for those dungeons without story. They could also be used in dungeon with a story after it is cleared.

short_description: Adds the player character "Sakuya Izayoi" and the side story "Clock Remains" to Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-.

fullgame.name: Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded- / 不可思议的幻想乡TOD -RELOADED- / 不思議の幻想郷TOD -RELOADED-

supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 VRAM 3GB+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
